tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE communication_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    mediator_id INT,
    party_id INT,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    log_message TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE mediator_logs (
  mediator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  party_id INT,
  communication_date DATETIME,
  communication_medium VARCHAR(50),
  communication_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE party_logs (
  party_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  mediator_id INT,
  communication_date DATETIME,
  communication_medium VARCHAR(50),
  communication_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE mediators (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    phone VARCHAR(20),
    organization VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE parties_involved (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    role VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    address VARCHAR(100),
    phone VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE communication_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    mediator_id INT NOT NULL,
    party_id INT NOT NULL,
    communication_date DATE NOT NULL,
    communication_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    communication_details TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (mediator_id) REFERENCES mediators(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (party_id) REFERENCES parties_involved(id)
);

CREATE TABLE communication_logs (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  mediator_id INT,
  party_id INT,
  message TEXT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (mediator_id) REFERENCES mediators(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (party_id) REFERENCES parties_involved(id)
);
CREATE TABLE mediator (id INT PRIMARY KEY,name VARCHAR(255),email VARCHAR(255),phone_number VARCHAR(20),created_at TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE party (id INT PRIMARY KEY,name VARCHAR(255),email VARCHAR(255),phone_number VARCHAR(20),created_at TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE communication_log (id INT PRIMARY KEY,mediator_id INT,party_id INT,message TEXT,sent_at TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE conflict (id INT PRIMARY KEY,name VARCHAR(255),description TEXT,started_at TIMESTAMP)
